title: Build a React Native Mobile App for E-commerce
description: Looking for an experienced React Native developer to build a cross-platform mobile app for our e-commerce platform. The app should include user authentication, product browsing, shopping cart, payment integration, and order tracking features.

title: WordPress Website Redesign with Custom Theme
description: Need a professional WordPress developer to redesign our company website. The new design should be modern, responsive, and include a custom theme. Must have experience with Elementor or similar page builders.

title: Python Django Backend API Development
description: Seeking a Django developer to create a RESTful API for a SaaS application. The API should handle user management, authentication, file uploads, and integrate with third-party services. Experience with PostgreSQL and Redis required.

title: Vue.js Admin Dashboard Development
description: Looking for a Vue.js expert to build a comprehensive admin dashboard with data visualization, user management, analytics, and reporting features. Should be responsive and use modern UI frameworks like Vuetify or Element Plus.

title: Laravel E-commerce Platform with Payment Gateway
description: Need an experienced Laravel developer to build a full-featured e-commerce platform. Features should include product management, shopping cart, checkout process, payment gateway integration (Stripe/PayPal), order management, and admin panel.

title: Mobile App UI/UX Design (Figma)
description: Seeking a talented UI/UX designer to create mobile app designs using Figma. The app is for a fitness tracking platform. Need modern, intuitive designs for iOS and Android with design system and component library.

title: Node.js Real-time Chat Application
description: Looking for a Node.js developer to build a real-time chat application using WebSockets. The app should support multiple rooms, private messaging, file sharing, and user presence indicators. Experience with Socket.io required.

title: Angular Enterprise Application Development
description: Need an Angular developer to build a complex enterprise application with multiple modules, forms, data tables, and reporting features. Should follow Angular best practices and use NgRx for state management.

title: Full Stack Development: React + Node.js
description: Seeking a full-stack developer to build a complete web application from scratch. Frontend in React with TypeScript, backend in Node.js with Express, database in PostgreSQL. Must include authentication, CRUD operations, and deployment setup.

title: WordPress Plugin Development
description: Need a WordPress developer to create a custom plugin for membership management. The plugin should handle user registration, subscription plans, payment processing, and member-only content access.

title: Shopify Store Setup and Customization
description: Looking for a Shopify expert to set up a new online store, customize the theme, configure products, set up payment gateways, and optimize for SEO. Experience with Liquid templating language required.

title: Machine Learning Model Integration
description: Need a Python developer with ML experience to integrate a pre-trained machine learning model into our web application. The model should process images and return predictions via API endpoints.
